ygData.subject: gargoyle island
ygData.msgSnippet: my 25 bard soloed there pretty easily.  they all conned blue to me at that point.  pain in the butt for melee classes tho since you need to get bound in
ygData.messageBody:
my 25 bard soloed there pretty easily. they all conned blue to me
at that point. pain in the butt for melee classes tho since you need
to get bound in freeport and take boat back to your body if you die.
i don't think i ever died to a gargoyle tho. killed about 10 in an hour,
got 2 eyes, got bored, went back to unrest the last time i was there.
there were maybe 2 other groups on the island at the time, but i hear
that it is pretty packed usually.
